Name: Establishment of an office of restaurant recovery in response to the COVID-19 pandemic, and the expiration and repeal thereof.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of an office of restaurant recovery in response to the COVID-19 pandemic, and the expiration and repeal thereof
BodyName: Committee on Governmental Operations, State & Federal Legislation

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
